description:
*** 50% OFF FOR A LIMITED TIME! ONLY $75! ***

Do you want to create Apple Watch Apps? Become proficient at Swift?

The Apple Watch is selling of the charts! It's set to hit 25 million units by the end of the year! Right now, the app store is still completely empty and waiting for your apps to fill those slots!

Take this course now, and be one of the first to have yours apps available right now!

The best part? No programming experience required! Every section will consist of three parts. The first part, is a basic outline of the app, so that you understand what are you actually creating. After that, I've divided the content, into bite-sized chunks, so that I never speak over your head, and I'll explain everything properly. To finish off the course, I've added exercises, and quizzes at the end of every section to revise everything you've learned.

We'll dive into a thorough explanation of what is Swift, and its basics. Once we finish that, we'll create over 12+ applications covering all the WatchKit SDK elements, including Tables, Menu Objects, Glances, Actionable Notifications, and much more!

Wondering what apps we'll be creating? Here are some!

  • Emoji Dictionary1
  • Weather App!
  • Dice Roll!
  • Coin Flip App!
  • Tic Tac Toe!
  • Jokes App!
  • Daily Quotes!
  • And much, much more!

I am an energetic and engaging instructor, and you'll never feel bored in my videos.

What makes me a good instructor?

  • I will never talk over your head!
  • 4+ Courses, 6000+ Students, and more that 40+ 5-Star Reviews!
  • No wordy or complicated philosophies
  • I'll teach you how to make apps that you can share with your peers, family and more!
  • I don't ramble around, I get straight to the point
  • And, I don't just tell you what to do, I'll explain it, and take you through everything you need to know

Well, what are you waiting for? It's a no brainer! Take this course now and your future self will thank you for it!

Cheers!
title: The Ultimate Apple Watch Developer Course
